entry.title: Formula E: High Voltage Beginner's Guide—Get Started in the Play-to-Earn Racer
entry.summary: Play-to-earn racing game Formula E: High Voltage pays you crypto tokens for successful finishes. Our guide will get you up to speed.

entry.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!
In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme.
They discuss - How to sell feet pics - If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems - the intersections between crypto and sex work

entry.title: Someone Got $8.4 Million in Blur NFT Marketplace's Latest Airdrop
entry.summary: One JPEG flipper saw millions of dollars in rewards from Blur's Season 2 airdrop. Now the marketplace is teasing its own Ethereum layer-2 network, Blast.

entry.title: 'Oops, You Stepped Into the Future': Nike Drops Sneakers With NFTs
entry.summary: You don't need to own an expensive NFT to buy the latest Nike x RTFKT sneakers—and they actually come with NFTs.

entry.title: Ubisoft Is Bringing Rayman, 'Captain Laserhawk' NFT Avatars to The Sandbox
entry.summary: Rayman and characters from Beyond Good & Evil are joining The Sandbox with a collection based on Ubisoft’s new Netflix series.

entry.title: Champions Tactics Preview: Everything You Need to Know About Ubisoft's NFT Game
entry.summary: Champions Tactics: Grimoria Chronicles is a PVP game with figurine-style NFT characters.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis
entry.summary: Artist and Art Blocks advisor Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to discuss his practice, his thoughts on the future, and his DJ alter ego.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis
entry.summary:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Solana's Top NFT Project Just Pumped 122% in a Week
entry.summary: Mad Lads has surged to become the leading Solana NFT project based on floor price—briefly topping DeGods on Ethereum too.

entry.title: Someone Just Paid $400K for This Ethereum NFT of Vitalik as a Jester
entry.summary: The painting of Vitalik Buterin, "EthBoy" by Trevor Jones and Alotta Money, broke records in 2020. The Ethereum NFT just sold for a lot more.

entry.title: Ubisoft Will Give Away Free Ethereum NFTs for 'Champions Tactics' Game
entry.summary: Assassin’s Creed maker Ubisoft says it will host a free Ethereum NFT mint for Champions Tactics, its upcoming game on Oasys.

entry.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.

entry.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash
entry.summary: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.

entry.title: Bazooka Tango Raises $5 Million to Revive 'Shardbound' as NFT Game
entry.summary: Game studio Bazooka Tango will use the funds to hire staff and bring the Immutable zkEVM game Shardbound closer to completion.

entry.title: PancakeSwap Launches Crypto Gaming Hub—And You Can Earn CAKE
entry.summary: Multi-chain decentralized exchange (DEX) PancakeSwap is pushing into games, starting with a couple built around its CAKE token and NFTs.

entry.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action.
Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'
entry.summary: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Play-to-Earn Mobile Dog Training Game 'Dogami Academy' Launched
entry.summary: Exclusively playable by Dogami NFT holders, Dogami Academy is an iOS and Android game that pays out crypto token rewards to players.

entry.title: NHL Breakaway Hockey NFT Collectibles Platform Opens to the Public
entry.summary: The NHL's take on NBA Top Shot has opened up to everyone, with video highlights minted as collectibles on the Polygon network.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: An NFT Rug Pull Scammer Has Finally Been Convicted, Faces Federal Prison
entry.summary: Aurelien Michel, creator of the Mutant Ape Planet NFT project, faces up to five years in federal prison after pleading guilty Tuesday to wire fraud charges.

entry.title: Disney NFT Platform Revealed by Dapper Labs, With Star Wars and Pixar Included
entry.summary: NBA Top Shot maker Dapper Labs is expanding beyond sports with digital Disney pins minted as NFTs on Flow.

entry.title: Mad Lads NFTs Hit All-Time High as Backpack Taps FTX Lawyer for Exchange Launch
entry.summary: Solana’s Mad Lads NFTs are ripping after Backpack reveals more of its exchange plans and opens up early signups.

entry.title: Check Your Wallets: Your NFTs Might Not Be So Worthless Anymore
entry.summary: Prices are up, sales are rising, and traders are buzzing. Are NFTs back? Not fully, but there’s a potential comeback brewing.

entry.title: Here We Go Again: Pet Rock JPEGs on Bitcoin, Ethereum Sell for Over $100K
entry.summary: EtherRock NFTs and Bitcoin Rock Ordinals are selling for six-figure sums, fueling hopes that another JPEG bull run is around the corner.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: Roblox CEO Envisions In-Game NFTs as Part of Open Ecosystem 'Dream'
entry.summary: Roblox CEO David Baszucki said that limited edition NFT items could launch in the future as part of an open ecosystem. But will it happen?

entry.title: Why the Creator of Netflix's 'Selena' Is Saying No to Hollywood—And Yes to NFTs
entry.summary: Moisés Zamora, a veteran of the studio system, is now launching an NFT-backed platform for indie filmmakers called Videomart.

entry.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: You Can Now Lend Your NFTs to Gamers and Earn Passive Income
entry.summary: LootRush will let gamers list their NFTs for rent on its marketplace, allowing them to earn passive income for game items like cards and land.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: Illuvium Ethereum Token Surges After Epic Games Store Listing
entry.summary: Lavish Immutable X game Illuvium is coming to the Epic Games Store, and the news fueled a spike in the ILV token price.

entry.title: Bored Ape NFT Holder Threatens Legal Action Over ApeFest Eye Injuries
entry.summary: The CEO of Artfi, Asif Kamal, is one of several ApeFest attendees who experienced eye pain after the festival.

Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Ethereum Gaming Sidechain Ronin Is On Fire—Here's Why
entry.summary: Axie Infinity’s Ronin network is growing as more games launch, tripling active users and pumping the price of RON.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.summary: Luxury house Gucci brings its London historical exhibit into the metaverse with Gucci Cosmos Land in The Sandbox.

entry.summary: Sales of NFTs hit a three-month high on Monday, building on a positive trend that emerged in October before "The Simpsons" took on NFTs.

entry.summary: San Antonio Spurs rookie Victor Wembanyama gets his first NBA Top Shot NFT today after last week’s $110K Sorare NFT sale.

entry.summary: From PFP collections like CryptoPunks to specific digital art references, the newest 'The Simpsons' episode dove deep into the NFT ecosystem.

entry.summary: The Simpsons-themed NFT projects surged on Monday after the seminal sitcom bashed digital collectibles in the latest episode.

entry.summary: NFTs were a punchline on 'The Simpsons' this weekend. But in 2021, the iconic show sold golden, Bart-themed digital collectibles to its fans.

entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.

entry.title: Bored Ape Creator Yuga Labs and Magic Eden Launching Ethereum NFT Marketplace That Enforces Royalties
entry.summary: Magic Eden’s new Ethereum NFT marketplace will be “contractually obligated” to pay royalties. What does that mean for traders?

entry.title: NFTs Are Back? Sales Jump 32% in October, Led by Ethereum
entry.summary: After months of falling sales, the NFT market grew substantially in October, per data from DappRadar—even if it's still far from the peak.

entry.title: OpenSea Slashes NFT Marketplace Staff by 50%
entry.summary: NFT marketplace OpenSea, valued at $13.3 billion in 2022, confirmed Friday that it has laid off about half of its staff.

entry.title: Amazon Is Giving Away Free Gaming NFTs—Here's How to Claim
entry.summary: UPDATE: Brawlers enters the ring with Amazon Prime Gaming, offering a free NFT fighter and other perks, while Mojo Melee launches a new NFT.

entry.summary: San Antonio Spurs phenom Victor Wembanyama is putting up numbers—both on the court and in Sorare NBA. Here’s how much his NFT sold for.

entry.title: 'Elemental Knights' Spinoff Leads New Games Coming to Immutable zkEVM
entry.summary: GensoKishi Online, Cursed Stone, and Sailwars are all coming to Immutable zkEVM, the upcoming gaming-centric Ethereum scaling network.

entry.summary: All of ACT Games’ portfolio will migrate to the Ronin network, beginning with the blockchain trading card game Zoids Wild Arena.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: Elon Musk Blasts NFTs—And Bitcoin Fans Love It
entry.summary: On Joe Rogan’s latest podcast, Elon Musk revived a common criticism of NFTs—so why are Bitcoiners thrilled about it?

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.

entry.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token
entry.summary: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.

entry.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
entry.summary:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.
